creator: Andre.Schneider@eas.iis.fraunhofer.de
text:
The manager webapp is located in the webapps subdirectory
($CATALINA_HOME/webapps). The web.xml deployment descriptor contains a different
location/docBase: 

<Context docBase="${catalina.home}/server/webapps/manager"
         privileged="true" antiResourceLocking="false" antiJARLocking="false">

Work-around: moving $CATALINA_HOME/webapps to $CATALINA_HOME/server/webapps.

creator: sriramnrn@gmail.com
text:
In tomcat 6.0.13, the tomcat/webapps/manager/META-INF/context.xml file contains:

<Context antiResourceLocking="false" privileged="true" />

In Tomcat 5.5.23, the tomcat/conf/Catalina/localhost/manager.xml contains the
correct path to the manager web app
<Context docBase="${catalina.home}/server/webapps/manager"
         privileged="true" antiResourceLocking="false" antiJARLocking="false">

Please ensure that you have a correct Tomcat release by downloading the Tomcat
binaries again.
